episode.title: Vance v. Universal Amusement Company, Inc.

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the disposition to announce in Vance against the Universal Amusement Company and for reasons stated in a per curiam opinion of the Court filed this morning, the judgement of the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit is affirmed.
Mr. Justice Powell joins me in a dissenting opinion and Mr. Justice White is joined by Mr. Justice Rehnquist also in a dissenting opinion.
